text.en: FIRE Dragon monsters you control are unaffected by your opponent's activated effects during your Main Phase 1 only. During your Main Phase: You can add 1 "Bestowed Dragon" monster from your Deck to your hand, then discard 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Overflowing Brightfleet Manor" once per turn. If this card is destroyed during the Battle Phase: You can target 1 Dragon Synchro Monster you control; its ATK becomes doubled.
